casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Glenn TURNER 440P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2016 Daniel Lawrence Spiegel, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Turner, Christopher Glenn. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of December 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of December 2016."
